title: Nine Inch Nails Announce 2025 “Peel It Back World Tour” [Updated]
description: The band's first live outing in three years consists of nearly 40 dates. Nine Inch Nails Announce 2025 “Peel It Back World Tour” [Updated] Scoop Harrison
author: Scoop Harrison
excerpt: Nine Inch Nails have announced the "Peel It Back World Tour," their first live outing in three years. The 37-date outing kicks off in June 2025.
text: Nine Inch Nails have announced the “Peel It Back World Tour,” their first live outing in three years. Spanning over 40 dates, the trek kicks off in Europe in June 2025 with a run of headlining shows and festival appearances. A North American leg follows beginning in August with arena shows in cities including Oakland, Portland, Vancouver, Seattle, Denver, Chicago, Toronto, Philadelphia, Boston, Brooklyn, Nashville, and Phoenix, before concluding on September 18th in Los Angeles. Update: Due to demand, NIN have added second shows in Chicago (8/20), Brooklyn (9/3), and Los Angeles (9/19) Get Nine Inch Nails Tickets Here Tickets for newly announced dates in Chicago, Brooklyn, and Los Angeles go on sale Friday, January 31st at 12:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster. Tickets to Nine Inch Nails’ other 2025 tour dates are now on sale. Fans can also look for deals or get tickets to sold-out dates via StubHub, where your purchase is 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s Fan Protect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. NIN mastermind Trent Reznor had previously hinted at plans to reignite the band in 2025. Already, he and longtime collaborator Atticus Ross are attached to score the upcoming film TRON: Ares under the Nine Inch Nails moniker, which will mark the band’s first new music since 2020. When asked in a recent interview with Consequence if additional NIN music could be in the works beyond TRON: Ares, Reznor teased, “Anything’s possible at this point.” Nine Inch Nails 2025 Tour Dates: 06/15 – Dublin, Ireland @ 3Arena 06/17 – Manchester, UK @ Co-op Live 06/18 – London, UK @ The O2 06/20 – Cologne, Germany @ Lanxess Arena 06/21 – Dessel, Belgium @ Graspop (Festival) 06/24 – Milan, Italy @ Parco della Musica Novegro 06/26 – Zurich, Switzerland @ Hallenstadion 06/27 – Vienna, Austria @ Wiener Stadthalle 06/29 – Amsterdam, Netherlands @ Ziggo Dome 07/01 – Berlin, Germany @ Uber Arena 07/03 – Gdynia, Poland @ Open’er Festival (Festival) 07/05 – Roskilde, Denmark @Roskilde Festival (Festival) 07/07 – Paris, France @ Accor Arena 07/10 – Madrid, Spain @ Mad Cool Festival (Festival) 07/12 – Oeiras, Portugal @ NOS Alive (Festival) 08/06 – Oakland, CA @ Oakland Arena 08/08 – Portland, OR @ Moda Center 08/10 – Vancouver, BC @ Rogers Arena 08/12 – Seattle, WA @ Climate Pledge Arena 08/14 – Salt Lake City, UT @ Maverik Center 08/15 – Denver, CO @ Ball Arena 08/17 – St. Paul, MN @ Xcel Energy Center 08/19 – Chicago, IL @ United Center 08/22 – Detroit, MI @ Little Caesars Arena 08/23 – Toronto, ON @ Scotiabank Arena 08/26 – Baltimore, MD @ CFG Bank Arena 08/27 – Philadelphia, PA @ Wells Fargo Center 08/29 – Boston, MA @ TD Garden 08/31 – Cleveland, OH @ Rocket Mortgage Fieldhouse 09/02 – New York, NY @ Barclays Center 09/05 – Raleigh, NC @ Lenovo Center 09/06 – Nashville, TN @ Bridgestone Arena 09/09 – Duluth, GA @ Gas South Arena 09/10 – Tampa, FL @ Amalie Arena 09/12 – Houston, TX @ Toyota Center 09/13 – Ft. Worth, TX @ Dickies Arena 09/16 – Phoenix, AZ @ Footprint Center 09/18 – Los Angeles, CA @ Kia Forum
html:
Nine Inch Nails have announced the “Peel It Back World Tour,” their first live outing in three years.

Spanning over 40 dates, the trek kicks off in Europe in June 2025 with a run of headlining shows and festival appearances. A North American leg follows beginning in August with arena shows in cities including Oakland, Portland, Vancouver, Seattle, Denver, Chicago, Toronto, Philadelphia, Boston, Brooklyn, Nashville, and Phoenix, before concluding on September 18th in Los Angeles. Update: Due to demand, NIN have added second shows in Chicago (8/20), Brooklyn (9/3), and Los Angeles (9/19)

Get Nine Inch Nails Tickets Here

Tickets for newly announced dates in Chicago, Brooklyn, and Los Angeles go on sale Friday, January 31st at 12:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

Tickets to Nine Inch Nails’ other 2025 tour dates are now on sale. Fans can also look for deals or get tickets to sold-out dates via StubHub, where your purchase is 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s Fan Protect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

NIN mastermind Trent Reznor had previously hinted at plans to reignite the band in 2025. Already, he and longtime collaborator Atticus Ross are attached to score the upcoming film TRON: Ares under the Nine Inch Nails moniker, which will mark the band’s first new music since 2020. When asked in a recent interview with Consequence if additional NIN music could be in the works beyond TRON: Ares, Reznor teased, “Anything’s possible at this point.”

Nine Inch Nails 2025 Tour Dates:
